label: 天皇
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Theocratic head of the Japanese state, being the most direct descendant of the Great Sun Goddess (Amaterasu Ōmikami), her high priest on earth, head of the Shintō religion, patriarch of the Imperial Family and the spiritual and blood father of the Japanese people. [天照大神、神道]
